title: Place for a village
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: Some unique sites are shown in this film, including the Russell Street Police Station, the Museum, the State Library, Government House, Captain Cook’s Cottage, Melbourne High and Grammar Schools, an Italian restaurant with a dinner and a show, the suburb of Toorak and the Holden GM factory. This film also opens to some aerial footage from the era of the inner city blocks. Commentary by Harry Dearth.
